item.title: Success Is A Verifiable System
item.description: Maybe you’re a struggle sport. An undefined blob of human misery, awaiting death in a slurry of shame and complete unanticipation. Maybe you feel unable to help yourself become successful, either due to lack of knowledge or ability to strive. That’s right. Welcome to the human experience. With your host, the shitty human experience co-ordinator. Perhaps it’s because you feel fearful or possibly shameful of the potential outcome, producing anxiety via your own self-perception.
